content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x1)

### Coal mine at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1)

### Iron plate factory at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position x1)
- Inserter (position y1) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position z1) that connects the furnace at position x1 to the assembling machine at position x1

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough of the required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, iron-gear-wheel requires iron-plate, which must be available in sufficient quantity.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when inspecting inventories
- Check the inventory of the furnace or other entities after ensuring they have been used or interacted with to avoid confusion about their state.
